item.title: Homemade Chicken Ramen
item.description: Ingredients Chicken 4 Chicken Breasts (boneless) 2 tbsp unsalted butter Salt and Pepper Broth 4 tsp sesame or vegetable oil 4 tsp fresh ginger, minced 6 tsp fresh garlic, minced 6 tbsp low-sodium soy sauce 4 tbsp mirin 8 cups rich chicken stock 1 1/2 cups fresh shitake or bella mushrooms Sea Salt (to taste) Noodles 6 (2-3oz) packs of dried ramen noodles Extras 6 Eggs 1 cup scallions or green onions, tops sliced optional: fresh jalapeno slices Directions Cook the chicken: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees.
